alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 9:00PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: A surface low remains along the NE Gulf Coast this evening bringing bands of moderate to heavy snow at times over the panhandle. The bulk of precipitation has moved SE of Yakutat and now blankets the Central and Southern Panhandle. As the low continues to shift S along the coast, an enhanced band of heavier snow will develop over the Central Panhandle and move S through late tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates are expected through Friday night. Lower snowfall totals may be possible in Skagway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
